io.springlets.format

Class AbstractEntityPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.springlets.format.EntityExpressionSupport
      • io.springlets.format.AbstractEntityPrinter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.format.Printer<Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntityMessagePrinter, EntityPrinter

    public abstract class AbstractEntityPrinter
extends EntityExpressionSupport
implements org.springframework.format.Printer<Object>
    A base abstract Printer for objects values using a SpEl expression to build a String with the object properties and methods.
    Author:
    Cèsar Ordiñana at http://www.disid.com[DISID Corporation S.L.]

                             String defaultExpression)
        Creates a new instance with the given expression parser.
        Parameters:
        parser - to parse the expression
        templateParserContext - context to use to parse the expression
        conversionService - the ConversionService to use to convert property values inside the expression
        defaultExpression - expression to use if the expression to use in the conversion is empty
